me 7 years old:" mom! Look! Fergie's on this Kidzbop CD! Can i get it ???? Plz plz plz plz plz plz???
My mom: sure
*gonna blow up with exciement*            *about 9 years later*
Me: hey mom im gonna get this Fergie CD, is that ok?
Mom: Yeah, sure. Idc, do u have ur own money to pay for it?
Me: Yeahhhhhh?
Mom:Good cuz its not like i was gonna pay for it.
Feel like I'm flying to an exotic country listening to this song. Got a lot to thank it for tbh, the song that got me to get The Duchess and now it's one of my favourite albums. Well done Fergie!
G.L.A.M.O.R.O.U.S. The flossy, flossy.
